channel.title: My small experiment going wrong :)
channel.description:
Well, I'm using the Deltascape source, and I'm trying to make a PK point system for fun :)
I've started off with [code] public int killCount() { killCount = 0; }[/code]
and if i try to compile it says this:
[code]client.java:53 cannot find symbol symbol : variable killCount location: class client killCount = 0;[/code]
What am I doing wrong?

item.title: My small experiment going wrong :)
item.dc:creator: @IP1 IP
item.description:
@IP1 wrote:

No problem, but future steps will need to be taken in order to have the killCount int save to your character or moreinfo files.

Read full topic

item.title: My small experiment going wrong :)
item.dc:creator: @davedave davedave
item.description:
@davedave wrote:

Thanks dude

Read full topic

item.title: My small experiment going wrong :)
item.dc:creator: @IP1 IP
item.description:
@IP1 wrote:

You must declare

public int killCount = 0;

somewhere in your client.java.

Basically, what you coded is trying to find the killCount process but since it doesn’t exist the compiler won’t compile it. Try adding above where you added public int killCount()

Also, your code should look like this:

[code]
public int killCount = 0;

public void killCount() {
killCount = 0;
}[/code]

Read full topic
